scripts.android-dev: rimraf src-tauri/gen/android && rimraf dist && tauri build && tauri android init && npx tauri icon ./mobile-icon.png && npx tauri android dev
scripts.android-dev-phone: rimraf src-tauri/gen/android && rimraf dist && tauri build && tauri android init && npx tauri icon ./mobile-icon.png && npx tauri android dev 'M2007J17G'
scripts.android-build: rimraf src-tauri/gen/android && rimraf dist && tauri build && tauri android init && npx tauri android build
